name: Village Chief's Glove
description: Proof of completing Pokke Beginner Quests. Earned a present from the Chief.

name: Village Chief's Hat
description: Proof of completing Pokke intermediate Quests. Shows courage in the brutal cold.

name: Village Chief's Scarf
description: Proof of completing Pokke Hard Quests. When worn, it is quite warm.

name: Village Chief's Coat
description: Proof of completing all Pokke Quests. Proves one is a first-class hunter.

name: Mane Necklace
description: Proof of slaying a Kirin. Retains the beauty of its thousand-year mane.

name: Blood Onyx
description: Proof of slaying an Akantor. Its brilliance captivates the soul.

name: King's Crown
description: Symbol of continued hunting success against giant monsters.

name: Miniature Crown
description: Symbol of continued hunting success against small beasts.

name: Bronze Medal
description: Proof of mastering all Gathering Hall ★ and ★★ Quests. No longer a novice.

name: Silver Medal
description: Proof of mastering all Gathering Hall 3★ and 5★ Quests. Shows true courage.

name: Gold Medal
description: Proof of mastering all Gathering Hall 6★ and 8★ Quests. A true achievement.

name: Black Belt Badge
description: Proof of passing all Battle Training at the Training School. This protects you.

name: Expert Badge
description: Proof of passing all Special Training at the Training School.

name: Legend Badge
description: Proof of passing all Group Training at the Training School. Sign of true power.

name: Rare Species Report
description: Record of the incredibly powerful colored monsters. Confirms all rare breeds.

name: Ecology Research Report
description: Report created from records of captured monsters. Proves successful captures.

name: Azure Stone
description: Pure piece of Machalite Ore. Beautiful, it is proof of Mining Area development.

name: Great Hornfly
description: Rare insect found in this area. Proves development of insect gathering area.

name: Springnight Carp
description: Splendid pink-scaled fish found during spring. Proves Fishing Pier development.

name: Dosbiscus
description: A rare red flower found in an area with deep snow. Proof of Field development.

name: Grateful Letter
description: A letter from a Felyne Chef saying, "Thanks, you are a great master, meow!"

name: Sage's Bracelet
description: Proof of combining proficiency. Feels like you can use anything, anytime.

name: Wyverian Artisan's Hammer
description: Dirty, but divine smithing hammer of a famed Wyverian. A weapon collector's seal.

name: Hunter's Progress
description: Map recording your hunting trek. Proof of travel to many game areas.

name: Nekoht's Whiskers
description: Proof of completing Nekoht 7★ Quests. Try it on, and become a majestic cat!

name: Nekoht's Bell
description: Proof of completing Nekoht 8★ Quests. A mysterious-sounding, handcrafted bell.

name: Nekoht's Coat
description: Proof of completing Nekoht 9★ Quests. A classy coat. Guild's crest in lining.

name: Pokke Village Gourd
description: Proof of completing all Pokke Urgent Quests. Warm up with a single sip.

name: Orichalcum Shield
description: Proof of mastering all Gathering Hall G-Level 1★ Quests. Exemplary hunter.

name: Platinum Shield
description: Proof of mastering all Gathering Hall G-Level 2★ Quests. Talk of the town.

name: Gold Shield
description: Proof of mastering all Gathering Hall G-Level 3★ Quests. Renowned worldwide.

name: Supreme Hunter's Crest
description: Cleared all of the Pokke and Gathering Hall Quests. No one can even come close!

name: Igneous Ring
description: Proof of slaying a Fatalis. Beneath its breathtaking sparkle lurks calamity...

name: Ring of Fire
description: Proof of slaying a Red Fatalis. Its mighty flames brings destruction to all.

name: Power-White Crown
description: Proof of slaying a White Fatalis. Its long, flowing white mane reveals its age.

name: Gold Snowshoes
description: Proof of successful Rajang hunt. Top-class snowshoes made of its golden hairs.

name: Ukanlos Bead
description: Proof of slaying a Ukanlos. It is said to allow its bearer into Heaven.

name: Epic Hunts Armband
description: Proof of tough struggles overcome and battles won during arduous Epic Hunts.

name: Warrior's Medal
description: Proof of passing all G-Lvl Training at the Training School. What gusto!

name: Guardian's Award
description: Proof of devotion to the Town and Fortress, saving them from many a crisis.

name: Flower Bouquet from the Guild
description: Earned an exorbitant number of Guild Points. A bouquet of Dosbiscus in full bloom.

name: Adventurer's Helm
description: Proof of collecting all gold-crowned rare treasure. Present form Treshi.

name: Trenya's Flag
description: Proof of funding Trenya on an incredible number of the most expensive adventures.

name: The Ultimate Catnip
description: Proof of Comrade gratitude for unlocking all Comrade Skills for one of your own.

name: Letter to My Fearless Leader
description: A letter from a Felyne Comrade saying, "Happy to be your partner, meow!"

name: Member's Card
description: Proof of creating numerous numbers of special weapons. Equipment shop's VIP card.

name: Wyverian Artisan's Mitten
description: Proof of a collector of armor. Mitt of a highly prolific armor artisan.

name: Hunter's Miracle
description: Map recording your hunting trek. Proof of travel to all game areas.
